ARABIC: فَأْتِيَا فِرْعَوْنَ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولُ رَبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Go to Pharaoh and say, "We are the Messenger of the Lord of all the worlds
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Go to the Pharaoh and tell him: 'We bring a message from the Lord of all the worlds
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Go, then, to Pharaoh and say to him: 'The Lord of the Universe has sent us
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They came to the Pharaoh and said, "We are the Messengerss of the Lord of the Universe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Therefore approach Firaun then proclaim, ‘We both are Noble Messengers of the Lord Of The Creation.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And go both of you to Fira`wn, and say: `We are the Messengers of the Lord of Al-`Alamin,'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then come to Firon and say: Surely we are the apostles of the Lord of the worlds:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So go you to Pharaoh, and say, "Verily, I am the Messenger of the Lord of all Being;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And come together unto Pharaoh and say: Lo! we bear a message of the Lord of the Worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Go to Pharaoh, both of you, and say, 'We are messengers from the Lord of the Worlds:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So go ye twain unto Fir'awn and say: verily we are the apostles of the Lord of the Worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So approach Pharaoh and say, ‘‘We are indeed envoys of the Lord of the worlds
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So go forth, both of you, to Pharaoh, and say: 'We have been sent by the Lord and Cherisher of the worlds;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when you both come to Fir'aun (Pharaoh), say: 'We are the Messengers of the Lord of the 'Alamin (mankind, jinns and all that exists),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: go both to Pharaoh and both of you say to him: 'We are (each) a Messenger from the Lord of all the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Go to Pharaoh, and say, ‘We are the Messengers of the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Go to Pharaoh and say, 'We are the messengers of the Lord of the worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:16] So the two of you approach Pharaoh and say, “Indeed We are — [indeed] each of the two of us is, the   Messenger of the Lord of the Worlds, to you,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And come together unto Pharaoh and say: Lo! we bear a message of the Lord of the Worlds) to you and to your people,
